longInfo:
Passport required.
- British passports and/or passport replacing documents must
  be valid on arrival.  
- Holders of British passports issued to those born in Bermuda
  are allowed to enter with expired passports. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold all documents required for next
  destination. 
- Bermuda Immigration officers will decide on max. period of
  stay (up to 6 months)  
 - This does not apply to holders of British passports
   endorsed  British Citizen  that contain a Bermudian Status
   stamp. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding one of the following could be refused
  entry:
  - return/onward tickets; or 
  - a Letter of Employment or Letter of Guarantee from
  prospective employer in Bermuda; or
  - a Landing Permit
